full_description:
Crucial 8GB DDR4 2400MHz Laptop RAM

Upgrade the memory on your compatible machine using the 8GB DDR4 2400 MHz SO-DIMM Memory Module from Crucial. This single memory module offers a potential of 8GB, a clock speed of 2400 MHz (PC4-19200), a 260-pin SO-DIMM form factor, operates the usage of 1.2V, and has a CAS latency of 17. Additionally, this RAM is not buffered and does now not help ECC technology. Adding more memory to your device will assist raise its capabilities, inclusive of improving system overall performance and alertness responsiveness. Start-up times will be progressed with fewer delays in the course of recurring operations, and more programs will be capable of run simultaneously with less difficult switching between them.

This Crucial 8GB DDR4 RAM comes with lifetime warranty.
